body:
Comment 4: 
Hi, thanks for the information.


Now I realize that it is my problem, I have these settings in my .vimrc

```
augroup folder
  autocmd!
  autocmd BufReadPost	*.go,*.js,*.coffee  setlocal foldmethod=syntax nofoldenable foldnestmax=3
augroup END

```

Which is the root reason of this issue.
Since It's not related with golang.
It can be closed.

Sorry for the miss report and thanks for your help again.
